name: Chip8 Emulator
description: A chip8 Emulator written in c++.This is my first project i published, so it might be a little buggy. It is about 2.500KB in size. To start the emulator drag a chip8 rom file onto the exe file. You can change the screen width, height, and fps in the .config file. Sound has not been implemented yet, and I will be updating and adding more features to the emulator.
